title: Implement Session Timeout Handling
description: Add automatic session timeout that redirects users to login when their session expires.
instructions:
Create a session manager that:

1. Tracks session expiration time
2. Checks session validity before each navigation
3. Shows a warning dialog when session is about to expire
4. Redirects to login with the current path preserved when session expires
5. Allows session refresh when user is active

Integrate this with the existing router redirect logic.

hints.text: Use Timer to schedule warning and expiration callbacks at the right times.
Track session status with an enum to distinguish between active, warning, and expired states.
Remember to cancel existing timers before starting new ones in refreshSession to prevent multiple callbacks.
